name: Underworld Assassin
description:
Kill the crime underworld leader.

Controls (Keyboard):

A-D: Move Left/Right

Spacebar: Attack

W: Jump

Controls (X-box Controller):

Left-Right Directions: Move Left/Right

A or Up Direction: Jump

X: Attack

Criteria:

Stealth - Enemies that are in line of sight of the player will attack.

Purple - Player is mainly colored purple.

Jump - Lite platforming in game. Jumping is required to traverse stages.

Wham! Sounds - An impact sound when you drop. A swish sound when you attack. Explosions when the boss's grenades explode.

Credits:

Art, Programming, Design: GeloKaiser

Music by Ozzed (https://ozzed.net/)

Sound Effects by Juhani Junkala
